owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

ref.description: Git ref (typically a branch name) for this codespace

location.description: The requested location for a new codespace. Best efforts are made to respect this upon creation. Assigned by IP if not provided.

geo.description: The geographic area for this codespace. If not specified, the value is assigned by IP. This property replaces `location`, which is closing down.

client_ip.description: IP for location auto-detection when proxying a request

machine.description: Machine type to use for this codespace

devcontainer_path.description: Path to devcontainer.json config to use for this codespace

multi_repo_permissions_opt_out.description: Whether to authorize requested permissions from devcontainer.json

idle_timeout_minutes.description: Time in minutes before codespace stops from inactivity

retention_period_minutes.description: Duration in minutes after codespace has gone idle in which it will be deleted. Must be integer minutes between 0 and 43200 (30 days).
